encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - There seems to be an issue with the display in Leiden+ of letters where an underdot is combined with an accent (see fr. 6,5 and fr. 5,21, where the underdot is displayed above the letter).

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Fr. 10,25: in the reference edition no lines are missing Fr. 9,41: the gap after ÏÎ¹Ï is of 11 letters, not 10 Fr. 8,1: the line numbering has be revised 1,15: paragraphos after l. 14 1,24: paragraphos after l. 25
Submit - Text entered from pdf of tesi di laurea.

div.p: This papyrus has been digitally edited by Holger Essler on the basis of an unpublished tesi di laurea by Riccardo Cavalli (discussed in Parma, 28 March 2012). Unless stated otherwise all supplements are by Cavalli. Update: TM 62483 is part TM 62498; for an up to date text, please consult that file.
